summary: A Study Calculator app with numeric keypad, arithmetic operations, calculation history, and a sleek dark-themed UI.

existing_features.title: Build a calculator UI with a numeric keypad (0–9), decimal point, operators (+, −, ×, ÷), equals button, clear (C), and backspace. Display the current expression and result in a prominent display area. Show a scrollable list of recent calculation history below the calculator.

Apply a sleek dark-themed visual design with high-contrast neon-green accents for operator buttons, soft white for digit buttons, and a dark charcoal background. Use a monospace font for the display and rounded button shapes. The layout should feel like a premium hardware calculator.

Rename the application to 'Study Calculator' — update the branded header title in App.tsx and any other visible instances of the app name (page title in index.html, any footer or metadata references) to display 'Study Calculator'.

new_feature_requests.summary: Build a fully functional calculator backend that supports basic arithmetic operations: addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division. Expose functions for performing calculations and maintaining a history of recent calculations (up to 10 entries).
